original_text: My Lord God in heaven has plenty of good and valuable things. Because you belong to Christ Jesus, God will give to you everything that you need.
korean_text: 나의 하나님이 그리스도 예수 안에서 영광 가운데 그 풍성한 대로 너희 모든 쓸 것을 채우시리라

sentences.original_text: has plenty of good and valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 좋고 귀한 것들을 가지고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: Because you belong to Christ Jesus
